page.title: 07 MUSIC
page.content: We asked about{150}people about their musical tastes. Popular music was enjoyed by most people and the most popular group was found to be{Wham} with{Duran Duran}a close second. However a lot of people in this area enjoyed country and western {music.} The most populer song in Britan on{ {28th June 1985}is{Frankie}by{Sister {Sledge.}The favourite song of the moment in Askern is{Relax}by{Frankie {goes to Hollywood.}Of the people we asked, only nineteen played an instrument, the most common one being a recorder which children often learn to play in school. Other instruments which people can play are piano, organ, guitar, clarinet and mouth organ.
